channel.title: How to make my own area in a 317 server
channel.description:
how do i make a area like in a 317 server like if i use all-star scape or something like that with a cave or something how do i make my own cave ?
thx for help
i have team viewer if u want to help me on that :P

item.title: How to make my own area in a 317 server
item.dc:creator: @The_Planter The Planter
item.description:
@The_Planter wrote:

You can get godwars maps by adding it to the cache, and make a boolean that make’s your own area.

public boolean inOWNAREA() { if (absX >= **** && absX <= **** && absY >= **** && absY <= ****) { return true; } else { return false; }

Change the **** to your coords

done.

IF YOU MEAN HOW TO CHANGE TO HOME THAN JUST FIND THE COORDS OF YOUR CURRENT HOME AND CHANGE IT.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make my own area in a 317 server
item.dc:creator: @Dustin.mcguire Dustin.mcguire
item.description:
@Dustin.mcguire wrote:

orcashark:

u cant “create” ur own area… but if you can look around the map… find a spot u like. close it off and make it that area… by coding whatever u want there… if ur looking for a cave. use the cave right near death plateau.

You can create your own area? Their are servers with football fields thats obviously not on original runescape -.-

Read full topic
